Things Are Going Swimmingly!
Suit up with a full set of SCUBA gear
Ease ocean exploration with craftable scuba gear!
SCUBA Gear can be crafted to aid in ocean travel.\n\nCopper and dried kelp are main components for each piece.
Flippers can be crafted with the following recipe:
The SCUBA Helmet can be crafted with the following recipe:
The SCUBA Tank can be crafted with the following recipe:
The Wetsuit can be crafted with the following recipe:
Flippers allow the user to swim much faster, but land traversal is greatly slowed.
The Wetsuit allows the user to swim up or down much faster, and maintains their current depth.
Wearing the scuba tank adds 4 minutes of underwater breathing time.
Wearing the scuba helmet increases underwater mining speed by 6 times.
